Save the token info if not already present in the tokens list.

sign_transaction(tx)[source]

Sign an Ethereum transaction with the account’s private key.

tx is an instance of the transaction object from a library like web3.eth.account.

static key_from_password(password: str, salt: str, iterations: int = 100000) → bytes[source]

Derives a secure key from a password and a hexadecimal salt using PBKDF2.

Parameters:

  • password (str) – The password to derive the key from.

  • salt (str) – A hexadecimal string representing the salt.

  • iterations (int) – The number of iterations for the PBKDF2 function.

Returns:

The derived cryptographic key.

Return type:

bytes

  • hd_path – The derivation path for the coin.

class pypergraph.dag_keyring.wallets.MultiChainWallet[source]

Bases: object

SID = 0
create(label: str, mnemonic: str = '')[source]

If mnemonic is set, restore the wallet. Else, generate mnemonic and create new wallet.

Parameters:

  • label – Name of the wallet.

  • mnemonic – Seed phrase.

deserialize(data: dict)[source]

Main functionality of this MultiChainWallet method is to create hierarchical determinable wallet keyring containing: { “network”: network, “accounts”: [{ “bipIndex44”: integer }] }

Parameters:

data – { “label”: self.label, “secret”: self.mnemonic }
